roleset.name: attack

example.name: all args
example.text: The Americans launched their missile strike against guerrilla camps in eastern Afghanistan .
example.arg: against guerrilla camps in eastern Afghanistan

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on strike-v.01. Corresponds to Vncls hit-18.1-1, bump-18.4-1, sound_emission-43.2.

roleset.name: refusal to work

example.name: args0 and 1
example.text: The guild began a strike against the TV and movie industry in March 1988 .
example.arg: against the TV and movie industry

example.name: with arg0
example.text: Because of a strike by Finance Ministry personnel the provisional estimate does n't correspond exactly to the consumer price index usually published .

example.name: with arg2
example.text: Collahuasi copper mine in northern Chile is operating “normally” as a workers’ strike over pay entered its third day

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on strike-v.02. No corresponding VNcls.

roleset.name: sports

example.name: both args
example.text: Tendulkar's strike on Dhoni won the game

example.name: No args
example.text: Tendulkar was on 199 in the last over and Dhoni hit a single to give Tendulkar the strike

roleset.note: Based on Bolt data. Slight comparison to strike.06. No Vn or Fn classes. Framed by Katie.
